channel.title: Black Screen/Auto-spawning Monsters (Continued)
channel.description:
Problem: Well, I was trying to update my mod island with a few monsters spawned and when I ran it, my command prompt said something about it couldn't load some monsters (most likely mine) and it just came up with a black screen and stayed there. Eventually, it said connection lost and my server crashed. I have tried adding NPC's from a tutorial I saw to try to see if it was the amount of space for NPC's, but they worked fine. So, for once in my coding career I forgot how to spawn new monsters? If you can, it would be great if you can post a tutorial (or link to one) that tells you how to properly add monsters to your server. The exact error I got was the following : Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "2 745 2532" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1279) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:27)
Also, an example of a Jad I spawned is the following : spawn = 2745 2532 3224 0 0 0 0 0 0 Jad
Server Base: PimpScape
(optional) Rating: 10
~Thanks[br][size=1]Posted at: December 08, 2006, 08:45:19 PM[/size][hr] ++Rep WILL be handed out for this problem ;)

item.title: Black Screen/Auto-spawning Monsters (Continued)
item.dc:creator: @adam2348 adam2348
item.description:
@adam2348 wrote:

deleting the line isn’t fixing it…just removing that monster all together…
just so u know

spawn = 2745 2532 3224 0 0 0 0 0 0 Jad
^ ^
those to should be spaces, the rest should be 1 tab
and should that 0 before jad be a 1 or 2 for walk type?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Nets8 wrote:

[quote=“PEN()R, post:8, topic:33317”]Look … u see where it says

java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string:(HERE) “2
745 2532”(HERE)
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.
java:48)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456)…blah blah

where i sayd (HERE) (HERE) thats the line that is making a error . delete that line
2 745 2532 just search for something like it in ur autospawn. cut it out SAVE COMPILE RUN . It should be fixed[/quote]

Thank you very much

item.title: Black Screen/Auto-spawning Monsters (Continued)
item.dc:creator: @Dipset Dipset
item.description:
@Dipset wrote:

ya man but listen did u use the space bar between each part? [br][size=1]Posted at: December 08, 2006, 09:01:48 PM[/size][hr]omfg answer?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 08, 2006, 09:04:29 PM[/size][hr][glow=red,2,300]WHEN ADDING NPCS USE THE TAB KEY NOT THE SPACE KEY[/glow]
